description:
Soft and simple, beautiful things don’t need to be complicated. Dressed up or dressed down, this light dress will keep you comfy from the office to the international gates. Made from an incredibly soft midweight Tencel blend that feels great and has a gentle drape.

  • Super soft Tencel™ and orgonic cotton blend is light, breathes well and has just enough spandex for a comfortable stretch
  • Subtle on-seam pockets because a great dress needs pockets
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabrics add confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
  • Relaxed fit has a casual, all day comfort
name: Bonnetier Crew Neck Dress - Women's
